1221500.name: SMILE GAME BUILDER Type-B Friends with Symbols
1221500.description:
Free downloadable 3D model resource pack!

This DLC is a resource pack that contains preset 3D models in SMILE GAME BUILDER "Type B", which are customized to modern outfits, and two types of symbol models (4 colors each). The SMILE GAME BUILDER users can download it for free.

This resource pack is royalty-free and available for commercial or non-commercial use only within games rendered using our products, or both using SMILE GAME BUILDER and Exporter for Unity to build to other consoles.
